org.mmbase.cache

Interface Cacheable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    NodeQuery, Query, SearchQuery
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractQueryWrapper, BasicNodeQuery, BasicQuery, BasicSearchQuery, ModifiableQuery, NodeQueryWrapper, NodeSearchQuery, QueryWrapper, RemoteCacheable_Proxy, RemoteNodeQuery_Proxy, RemoteQuery_Proxy, RemoteSearchQuery_Proxy

    public interface Cacheable
    A Cacheable object contains information on cache policies, which determines whether the object should be cached or not. The code that handles the caching should verify this for a cacheable object.
    Since:
    MMBase-1.8
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Pierre van Rooden
    See Also:
    CachePolicy
